EmailTemplate.name: Twist Cabin Black
EmailTemplate.subject: Original Twist Cabin is now available in Black.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
Following the success of our Original Twist collection, I am delighted to share that we have launched a new model in Black.
Tailor-made for both business and travel, this new model is accented with sophisticated black design and elegant leather in our iconic aluminium.
**As a Twist Check-in-L owner, I wanted to personally advise you about this new launch./Inspired by the Original Collection, the Twist in Black is a new take on our beloved Classic.**
Would you be interested in this product ?
Best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
